#===============================================================#
#                                                               #
#    Releasae Type: torrent - Installer + Full Version Patch    #
#                                                               #
#    Release Date: 5th April 2008                               #
#                                                               #
#    Release Size: 12 MB                                        #
#                                                               #
# Embark on an epic quest to recover the stolen treasures of    #
# ancient Egypt in LUXOR MahJong. The fun and challenge is      #
# unending with 200 unique and exciting layouts available in    #
# three awesome play modes: Adventure, Single and Traditional.  #
# Three difficulty settings ensure that any player, from        #
# novice to expert, will find a challenge. Three exotic tile    #
# sets make LUXOR MahJong a truly custom experience. And with   #
# the all-new player ranking system, you can work your way up   #
# from a lowly Farm Hand to become the Pharaoh of all Egypt!    #
#                                                               #
#   Key Game Features:                                          #
#                                                               #
#    * 200 unique MahJong layouts                               #
#    * Three exotic tile sets                                   #
#    * Five magical power-ups                                   #
#    * Three difficulty settings                                #
#    * Three modes of play: Adventure, Single and Traditional   #
#    * Unique player ranking system                             #
#    * All new adventures in the land of Egypt                  #
#                                                               #
#   Minimum System Requirements:                                #
#                                                               #
#    Windows 98SE/2K/ME/XP                                      #
#    Pentium II 300MHz                                          #
#    128MB RAM                                                  #
#    40MB free HD space                                         #
#    DirectX compatible 16 or 32-bit Video Card with 16MB VRAM  #
#    (64 MB recommended)                                        #
#    DirectX 7 or later (DirectX 8 for hardware acceleration)   #
#    DirectSound compatible sound card                          #
#                                                               #
#   More details at: http://www.mumbojumbo.com/game/game/30     #
#                                                               #
